language.description: Expressive or receptive language deficits, including difficulty finding words or understanding speech.

cognitive.description: Cognitive decline including memory issues, attention deficits, and executive function impairment.

balance.description: Unsteady gait, poor coordination, and tremors during voluntary movements.

consciousness.description: Altered level of consciousness, sleep disturbances, and potential memory deficits. Increased risk of seizures due to irritation of cortical tissue.

cranial_nerves.description: Multiple cranial nerve deficits affecting facial movement, swallowing, and eye movements.
